title: PM meets delegation from Balochistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar Monday here held a meeting with a delegation from Balochistan.Senator Sarfraz Bugti and Mir Khalid Lango were part of the delegation.The delegation felicitated the prime minister on assuming office and expressed their best wishes for him.
